title: The Sam Pilgrim Invitational was full of bangers
text:
Submit The Sam Pilgrim Invitational was full of bangers The second annual Sam Pilgrim Invitational went down at the Cycle Show in Birmingham last week and there were some seriously massive tricks going down show more on the dirt jumps. show less Please log in to post a comment. What is the most extreme thing you’ve ever done.
